name: On My Birthday...
description: Use Javascript to change elements on the page. Use specific events that happened on your birthday!

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors
description: Use Javascript to program the computer as an opponet to play a game of rock, paper, scissors!

name: Career: Marine Biologist
description: Explore a future career you may want to pursue and make an interactive website. Include pictures, videos, information and an eye-appealing design.

name: College Recruitment
description: Choose a college and create a recruitment site. Use eye-appealing visuals and Javascript.

name: Trunk or Treat
description: Make a website using JQuery and Javascript to showcase Marlboro High School's Trunk or Treat Event. Include important information and pictures.

name: Lil Bird Toy Company
description: Create a webpage for a mock toy company. Include important information and use Javascript to display elements (Co-worked with Kyle Rabkin).

name: Marlboro Tech Ed
description: Create a homepage for Marlboro High School Tech Department. Include many interactive elements and Javascript (Co-worked with Kyle Rabkin).

name: Florentino's Deli
description: Contact a client and have meetings/disscussions to create a webpage for them. Use Bootstrap for a responsive site and include aspects of Javascript.
